biography: Aatamin poika is a 1996 Finnish TV film drama lasting 45 minutes. The TV short film was directed and written by Heikki Veijola starring Meri Nenonen. It aired on the 21 April 1996 on Yle TV2.
aiSummary: Seppo Meri is a immunology specialist with an H-index of 83 at University of Helsinki (Member). Has been published in Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Cellular and Molecular Immunology, Journal of Neuroscience. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
